name: Parallel Universe (TkT)
description:
Parallel Universe

This is an old project, it have some bug and bad optimisation so i will remake another one ! Also, i'm reworking the design of the characters and i'm reworking the sound too !

Still, you can see what's updated in this build below:

  • the forest's tileset have been updated, it have more detail
  • the character's sprite have been updated... well only the idle and running front.
  • the forest's music have been a bit updated

Some special code:

  1. Pressing "L" in the menu will change the language. There's only french and english.
  2. Pressing left "ctrl" in the menu will set on the DebugMode

The DebugMode:

  1. Pressing 0 will reset the game
  2. Pressing 1 in game will show all the collision (there's no collision lol) and F1 will hide the collision (still no collision AHAH)
  3. Pressing 2 in game will set your speed to 12 and F2 will set the speed to the default value (6)
  4. Pressing 3 in game will disable collision (no collision in case you didn't know.) of course, F3 will enable them (unless they don't exist)
